name: Sour-Cherry Old-Fashioned
description: Sour cherries are too tart to eat raw, but go down amazingly easy when you muddle them with sugar and douse them with whiskey in this spin on a classic old fashioned.

recipeInstructions.text:
Put the cherries, orange peel, sugar
and bitters in an old-fashioned glass;
crush the sugar and cherries with a
muddler, spoon or anything else that will
get the job done. Fill the glass with ice,
add the whiskey and stir until the drink
is cold, about a dozen times.
